title: T205 Trading Post - Looking to trade for these front/back combos
author: 53toppscollector

posts.post_title: T205 Trading Post - Looking to trade for these front/back combos
posts.post_content:
Moved a bunch of these cards into my for sale thread. The graded tougher cards below I'd still be open to trade

Bres Open Mouth - Looking for a Cycle back
Raymond - Looking for a Cycle back
Sweeney - Looking for a Hassan 30 or Piedmont 42
Vaughn - Looking for a Piedmont 42 (straight swap)

i updated my first post with images for my cards to make it easier for everyone.

as i noted in my updated first post, i am also willing to buy the cards i am looking for and then just sell my existing copy if a trade isn't something you are interested in.

thanks
